FuncDef: This command forces the renewal of lease state and only applies to the 7450 ESS and 7750 SR.
CLIs: forcerenew { interface <interface-name> | sap <sap-id> | sdp <sdp-id:vc-id> } [ ip <ip-address> [ </mask> ] | mac <ieee-address> ]

ParaDef.Info: Forces renewal of the lease state for the specified service ID. Values-1 to 2147483647.
Forces renewal of the lease state for the specified SAP.
Forces renewal of the lease state for the specified IP address.
Forces renewal of the lease state for the specified MAC address.
Forces renewal of the lease state for the specified interface name.
